DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether integrated behavioral treatment approach help overweight obese individual also chronic pain reduce weight manage pain symptom . The goal research develop good treatment individual chronic pain overweight obesity . All participant study receive treatment weight management and/or pain symptom . Participants assigned random ( like pick blindly hat ) receive either : ( 1 ) Standard behavioral treatment weight loss ; ( 2 ) Standard behavioral treatment pain management ; ( 3 ) Integrated behavioral treatment weight loss pain .
DOC.brief_title: Simultaneously Targeting Obesity Pain : The STOP Trial
